name: Dead Again (Szolitor1)
description:
A simple puzzle game spiced up with a little action element. The goal of the player is to get out of a dungeon using the central mechanics of the game.

When the player dies, a tombstone appears that can be used to press buttons, but the player can only have a limited number of tombstones on the field at the same time. You have to find the way to the exit by changing the tombstones.
